# Spectre

## Pronunciation

/ˈspek.tɚ/

## Meanings
the idea of something unpleasant that might happen in the future:

### Noun
a ghost
A ghostly apparition, a phantom.

> A specter haunted the cemetery at the old Vasquez manor.

---

A threatening mental image.




spectre
